website_summaries.verdict: Supports 70 languages and allows for swift transition between languages in multi-lingual areas. High definition microphone technology improves overall translation capability.
pros: Well-place buttons on the side for mother and foreign languages
Has a relatively long working time of 8 hours with a 7-day standby time
Touch screen is easy to operate
cons: Bigger and heavier than other models
Inconsistent operation, and a few reports of missing items in packaging

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and fast translations
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful product, perfect for traveling. It was easy to set up and use. The device is well built and feels very sturdy to hold. I tried translating using my native language and I must say that it recognized more words and phrases than I anticipated. Very pleased with the translation results. It works super fast as well. Can’t wait to bring this device for my Europe trip.
customer_reviews.author: Z,D

customer_reviews.title: translator
customer_reviews.text: I made an appointment on the 12th of this month. I want to talk to the Americans about a very important thing. I bought it specially. On the 12th, I solved a big problem for me. The gentleman saw this new type of translation machine. I want to recommend the website to him. He also wants to buy this translation machine. It looks fashionable and works well, and the pronunciation is standard. The screen can be touched and played back, and the battery can be used for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: HGFJ

customer_reviews.title: I like this intelligent translator very much
customer_reviews.text: This intelligent translator is really easy to use, especially when we encounter communication barriers, its pronunciation is very standard, it can also be translated into many languages, the appearance of the design is also very beautiful, the screen can also touch, for me to solve a lot of difficulties, I really appreciate the amazon platform.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gringer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.  Accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, and she loves it and is having fun with it! It was very easy to start using right out of the box, and changing languages is only a matter of quickly scrolling from one to another. Each language is transcribed into easily-read text, and the translated language also into voice. The voice is a little mechanical sounding (no surprise) but clear and easily understood. Of the languages I’m familiar with, English, Spanish and Japanese, the translation and pronunciation are very accurate. My wife says the French is also accurate. We’ve been using it for six days so far and very pleased. (Will update if there is anything new to report.)
customer_reviews.author: D. Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed product with a smart operating system built on solid hardware
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed product with a smart operating system built on solid hardware, I like it very much. It works great on WiFi and can easily hook up with my cell phone hot spot, and support offline translation function, which makes it very convenient to use. Battery life is very decent, supports a whole day without a problem. The pronunciation is very natural - when you’re talking with someone of a different language through this translator’s 2 way translation, you won’t feel like you’re talking with a machine. It is also a great companion to help me learning Spanish. Overall I think it is an excellent investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Chang

customer_reviews.title: Great investment and good product
customer_reviews.text: This technology is great,nowaday you can easily have access to all the country but language would be the only issue. And this has solve the only gap it got. I m still very impressed by how accurate it got and how easy it is. It come with very simple setup and two button and touch screen make it very easy to operate
customer_reviews.author: wowl0ol

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but speak slowly
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. Provides accurate translation from English to a foreign tongue. However, sometimes it takes a few moments to translate, or you have to repeat your speech twice. But it works great! It came with the setup in Chinese, but changing over to English was no problem. I also like the fact the display shows exactly what’s being said. You will have to have WiFi with the password in order for it to work. I’m really looking forward to using it on my upcoming international trip to Thailand.
customer_reviews.author: D.R. Richey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, well done!
customer_reviews.text: I had low expectations on this one, but I must admit , it is way above any high expectations I may hoped for. The device is small, light and very accurate. The touch screen is not as sensetive as I would like it to be. It does need internet , however I knew that before I bought it. It is a great purchase. Be adivse that not all of the languages will show up on the list until you connect wifi so don't be alarmed if your language is not on the menu. It will show up as soon as you connect wifi. I will get another one for my kids as this is ideal to learn new languages.
customer_reviews.author: Iuval Hatzav

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted to be able to provide the same standard of care expected of me to an english speaking patient as to one who does not speak english. I tried it on a spanish speaking colleague and she was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my mom love it
customer_reviews.text: This translator is really good. My family came to the United States to travel, but I can't accompany them out. They can use this translator to go out and buy things, and the most important thing is that this translation can speak spanish. It’s too suitable. I tried it very well. Now I’m going to teach my mother to use it. He will use it but sometimes he will forget it. It’s really good
customer_reviews.author: TONY

customer_reviews.title: This translator looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to let people know that I didn't use it because it has to be hooked to WiFi to use it. I wanted a translator that didn't need the wifi support and I don't think they even make one of those. That is why I didn't rate any of the features BUT this Company worked with me and really did all they could to be sure I was Happy!
customer_reviews.author: warren Oie

customer_reviews.title: good help
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak Spanish, but I always need to speak to the gardener, it's very hard to me until I find this translator. It's easy to use, the only setup is to type in the wifi password, nothing else. Now I can speak to the gardener easily. Actually I want to use it for my upcoming Europe trip.
customer_reviews.author: serena

customer_reviews.title: Great pruduct!
customer_reviews.text: I have recently been promoted to the position of assistant to the president. The work pressure is also high, especially the number of international conferences. The language is a bit stressful. Sometimes I do n’t understand without concentration and delay work. . So I bought this translator. When the president holds international conferences, I often bring it with me. It can not only help me record the conference content, but also help me translate the conference content, which has helped me reduce a lot of stress, and It is small and convenient to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie Dixon

customer_reviews.title: It's very easy to translate
customer_reviews.text: I am using this translation product for the first time. The first impression it gave me was very practical. The machine voice can be adjusted, the translation speed is also very fast, the accuracy is also very high, but there are some wrong expression! This device is really great. Some people think that using a mobile phone is as good or better but it’s such an unreliable and inconvenient way to translate when needing!
customer_reviews.author: yo yo

customer_reviews.title: A good translator
customer_reviews.text: I got this machine to helps my parents and my husband to talk to each other. It works great so far, I it translate correct than I thought before. When you press the button and talk, it shows your language on the screen, then it translate almost at the same time, so at the moment you can recognize if the translation is right or not. Since it works wifi only, you can bring to the public place which has wifi. So my parents can bring it to most of the place, this is help them a lot. And you can also use as a dictionary, for the word that you need know the spelling. It's such a convenient equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Yi Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Translations Are Crystal Clear
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my elder Mom, who cannot speak English. I could press one button for her to talk in Spanish, listed to the translation in English, then I press the second button so I could speak in English, and got the translation in Spanish. You just need to be sure to learn the pace to talk and listen, but it was a Miracle! Now my mother can talk to her grand children, who cannot speak Spanish. AWESOME stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F. Raez

customer_reviews.title: Junk! Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The unit is made in China and boy does it show. Does not translate at all. No manual or instructions. And the only good thing I can say is that it looks great as it does in the picture. I cannot see how so many people are impressed with this. Unless they are paid reviews. If you want a paper weight this translator is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Chef

customer_reviews.title: Accurate translation
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate translation, we tried multiple languages and it works well! I bought this for my parents so that they can communicate with my husband when they are together. Needs wifi connection but can use hotspot when you are traveling. But this device is for speaking only, cannot recognize pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product!
customer_reviews.text: Product is horrible,gave to my son whom is a Tech specialist,he cant get it to work,customer service is Chinese, translation from tech rep is the worst.Im returning both as I got one for my daughter when she studies abroad. Real crap!
customer_reviews.author: kenneth abruzzi

customer_reviews.title: easy to use translator
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my mom from outside of country. She does not speak English at all, but she used this translator to DMV/Dentist and shopping while she's out alone. She very satisfied with the product and recommend this product to her friend.
customer_reviews.author: Wystan

customer_reviews.title: It can make a nice paper weight
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work half the time. Numerous emails to the company didn’t help it will not connect to the internet the tech support want me to send videos of the product to them. Get real.
customer_reviews.author: Prime

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, simple little translator. Voice recognition is excellent. Connects to WiFi and hotspots perfectly fine. I bought this mainly to have quick translations available to me when trying to read books in Italian (I'm an intermediate, still trying to learn). Seems more than durable and usable enough to take abroad as well. I would definitely recommend this to a friend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Marchese

customer_reviews.title: Works so far.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use to communicate with staff as well as learn a second language. Works well. Wish it had Icelandic. Early days learning to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joann L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Useful, easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This translation machine is accurate because of connecting to the wifi. I guess it gathers vocabulary from the internet directly. The funniest thing is it translates everything even our laugh. When I was talking with Chinese speakers through video chat, that machine had its humorous "hahaha" which made the conversation so relax. There are only three buttons making it so easy to use. If it could be connected to earbuds, that would make the translator perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Guess W

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but the server needs work!
customer_reviews.text: The server ( that is in Japan) kept quitting! We were in Los Angeles and could never get a conversation that wasn’t stopped by the message that the server couldn’t connect!
customer_reviews.author: Manya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent translator
customer_reviews.text: Easy to link internet. After connection the device fulfill high speed reflection and accuracy translation. Am going to learn more about the device function and will update later. Furthermore,I really like the body. It is portable and easy to operate for single hand. Honestly good product, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this voice translator machine. I got this for my office use because my job meets lots of people from around the world . So , This definitely makes my work much easier. Pretty easy to setup . no hassle . Most time , it translated quite accurate and clear . This translator really helped me a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lexis

customer_reviews.title: Nice Reactor
customer_reviews.text: The reactor is very good, can help me solve a lot of problems, his pronunciation is very standard, can translate a lot of languages, it is very convenient to use, I like it, a friend needs, I will recommend to him.
customer_reviews.author: Bennie Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Not very accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this product. It wasn't very accurate. It was a birthday gift for my son who travels a lot. I was disappointed when he tried it out. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working altogether
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product for a couple of days, but it stopped working. I mean, it boots up, and charges up, and it looks like it's ready to go, but when you press the red button, and speak, nothing happens. Nothing. I've re-booted it about 15 times by now, and nothing seems to revive it. Wifi is strong and connected. All settings have been checked and rechecked, but he device simply won't react anymore. It's completely useless and, after two days of using it, it turned into a grand waste of my money. Does anyone know how to get it going again?
customer_reviews.author: Fort Myers

customer_reviews.title: Quick translation
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a few days and used it. It feels great, the recognition is accurate, the translation is fast, and it can translate multiple languages. It is also very simple to operate with learning functions and is worth having
customer_reviews.author: YONG LIN

customer_reviews.title: Translation accuracy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful product, perfect for traveling. It was easy to set up and use. The device is well built and feels very sturdy to hold. I tried translating using my native language and I must say that it recognized more words and phrases than I anticipated. Very pleased with the translation results. It works super fast as well.
customer_reviews.author: chunyu

customer_reviews.title: It's almost 100 percent acurate
customer_reviews.text: 90 percent i like it, i was just sad that creole is not included among the languages.
customer_reviews.author: marlon ditianquin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband doesn’t understand English, Every time he communicate with others by using body language. It’s hard to understand most of time. This translator for him is perfect. It’s easy to use, just press home language button and saying, it’ll translate automatically to the language that you set up. The translation device translate very accurate, it is also good for learners.
customer_reviews.author: Zhangwei

customer_reviews.title: Very smart 👍
customer_reviews.text: This translation artifact button is very convenient. It is excellent in all aspects.Great product. so easy to set up and operate. This voice translator very small,but translator works great!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Translator
customer_reviews.text: Great to use but always need to be connected to wifi in order to use
customer_reviews.author: Sbmira

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: The translation works great for my mom, it is light weight and small. She like it!
customer_reviews.author: Liu

customer_reviews.title: A good translator friend
customer_reviews.text: I found this is very handy in traveling to a different country. I recently visited Poland, lots ppl cannot speak English. I found myself so lucky I have this in my hand and found a bathroom. It’s sort of easy to use, and it saved me lots time.
customer_reviews.author: Willian Wu

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my dad , small and easy translation. Works very good!
customer_reviews.author: Emilia

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Product works well. I use to talk to friend in Brazil and this has solved the problem of the language barrier.
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: translator
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to feel very convenient. Usually placed in the bag. It is more accurate than mobile phone software when going out. The efficiency is also high. More accurate translation language. Feel free to switch the language of each country
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I wish you didn't need internet wi fi to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: arlin47

customer_reviews.title: bought this translator for my parents!
customer_reviews.text: They will go to Japan for a several days . But they can't speak any Japanese. I found this device on amazon . I think it's a smart product . Hope my mom and dad can enjoy this holiday without language trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Demi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this product but it keeps saying no network even when my WiFi is connected. Super annoying don’t buy its a complete waste of time and product.
customer_reviews.author: vintagegoth

customer_reviews.title: get a better one..not this
customer_reviews.text: the touch screen had to be tapped repeatedly to get functions to work....simple words mis-interpreted...very disappointed....sent it back

customer_reviews.title: Login the device.
customer_reviews.text: My dislike is connecting to my Wi-Fi. I typed in id and there is NO Enter Tell me where it is ? what button to punch.

customer_reviews.title: Good devivce
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my wife and she is very impressed with the product.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry and use
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this! It works great. The instructions are easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: yingying

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item
customer_reviews.text: Work great , use it everyday, got to have one , nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Fuego

customer_reviews.title: very bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy!!! I have been having issues with this device since buying it and now it won't even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn S Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use. I like it. I will use it for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Brunilda Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Refused to charge at all!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I didn't test this translator when it first arrived. I had put it on the side and tried it after the return period ended. The translator did not charge at all after numerous tries so it is totally useless to me. I would not recommend anyone purchasing this item. I am now stuck for the full purchase price I paid!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bertin

customer_reviews.title: It does the work but,
customer_reviews.text: This device has to be conected to a Hot spot or Wi-Fi in order to work, the software looks old and slow. With a good translate app on your phone you will have a much better result.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Can’t talk behind my back now cuz this only works on wifi
customer_reviews.text: I love this translator it’s so easy to learn how to use and you can speak full sentences and gets it right 99% of time. Perfect for me at work where my Mexican workers Conveniently forget to speak English or understand English now it doesn’t matter. Just talk into the mic UPDATE sucks it only works with a wifi connection useless
customer_reviews.author: Mirko

customer_reviews.title: The device doesn't translate.
customer_reviews.text: I have a huge problem with voice translater. It worked good for a week but now it doesn't translate. I tired a lot of language but I get always the same massage: recognition error ( in chinese). The English is the only language what the translater knows. I rebooted I turned off and on but nothing help...
customer_reviews.author: Bence

product_meta.title: [Upgraded] Smart Voice Translator Device,82 Languages Instant Two Way Translation with 2.4 Inch Touch Screen Portable for Travelling Learning Business Shopping Meeting
product_meta.description:
BUOTH Smart Voice Simultaneous Translator 

◆Support WIFI +Hotspot network connecting
◆Suppport 82 countries languages two way translation 
◆Face to Face instant translation
◆Independently used，no need to install APP to your mobile 
◆Ttouch screen to shows voice to text and translation text
◆ Reach 97% accurate rate
◆1200mAh Large capacity polymer battery, standby time7days, working hours 8 hours. 
◆Fast respond within 0.3s 
◆Support playback function 

Equipment parameter : 
Product Size: 140*58*12mm
Weight: 95.6g 
Screen size:2.4inch 
Touch screen:IPS Capacitive touch screen 
Screen Resolution: 240*320 
Processor:MTK6572
WIFI:MT6627PN 
Battery capacity:1200mAh 
Standby time:7days 
Long working time:8hours 
Charging voltage:5V/1A 

Support 70 countries languages freely translation: 
Chinese (Simplified), Cantonese, Chinese (Traditional), English (US), English (Philippines), English (Ireland), English (UK), English (Canada), English (Australia)
Japanese, Korean, French, Russian, Finnish, Spanish, Greek, Arabic (United Arab Emirates), German, Danish, Czech, Vietnamese, Ukrainian, 
Turkish Filipino (Taga Road) ,Thai , Swedish, Serbian, Romanian, Portuguese, Polish, Dutch (Netherlands), Norwegian (Blog Mel),
Norwegian (Nynorsk) Cambodia (Khmer), Italy Language (Italy), Indonesian, Hungarian, Hindi, Malay, Israeli (Hebrew) 

Packaging List:
1xInstant voice language translator
1xEnglish Manual
1xCharging cable

Pls Noted:
1.The device is only used in WIFI or Hotspot internet 
2. This product is non-waterproof 
3.Do not place it in an environment with high temperature
feature_bullets: ➣Language Translator Device Two Way：The multi-language portable translator supported 82 languages two way real-time translation.With this muti-language translator you can go everywhere you want,the language can't block you any more.

➣Instant Voice Tranlation:Come with 2.4inch touch screen,when you speak out what you want to translate,the translation will also into text on the screen.It's very helpful for talking with others and make a better understanding for each other.

➣Smart Portable Translator:Foreign language translator only used in Wifi or hotspot internet,no need for SIM card, no need to download APP.Widely application in travelling,learning,shopping,business,making friends,comuncation and so on.

➣Electronic Translators: The language translator with high-definition recording, independent noise reduction microphone, and can accurately enter language in noisy environment, always keep voice clear, and it's also convenient for repeated listening, If the others doesn't hear it clearly, you can play it again.

➣Worry Free Guarantee:Buoth voice language translator will come with a 12-month warranty guarantee.And we will provide fast and easy-to-reach Customer Service to solve your problems within 12 hours. Report incorrect product information.
